Class.name: Report.VARCompra
Class.ViewQuery:
SELECT AFM.OrderNumber AS NumeroAFM, AFM.Free14 as Status, AFM.Approval1 AS NumeroEmpenho, $$getNoProcesso^VARPedidoCompra(AFM.FREE20) AS NumeroProcesso, AFM.DiscountTotal AS Desconto, AFM.FREE20 as NumeroPAM, $$SQLGetNaturezaEntrada^VARSQL(AFM.Free1) AS NaturezaEntrada, AFM.PurchaseOrderInformation AS Observacao, AFM.Free5 AS Banco, AFM.Free21 AS DescontoAFM, AFM.Free6 AS NumeroBanco, AFM.Free7 AS Agencia, AFM.Free8 AS Conta, $$SQLGetDescEntrega^VARSQL(AFM.Free22) AS CondicaoEntrega, AFM.Location AS CodLocalSolicitante, Locais.LocationName AS DescLocalSolicitante, $$SQLGetLocalEntrega^VARSQL(AFM.Location) AS EnderecoEntrega, $$SQLGetCentroCusto^VARSQL(AFM.Location) AS CentroDeCusto, AFM.Free3 AS CentroDeCustoOld, AFM.Free10 AS Prioridade, AFM.Free11 AS ModalidadeEmpenho, AFM.PackageAmount AS Embalagem,
$$SQLGetCondicaoPagamento^VARSQL(AFM.StandardCondition) AS CondicaoPagamento,
AFM.SupplierNumber AS CodFornecedor, $$SQLGetDescFornecedor^VARSQL(AFM.SupplierNumber)as DescFornecedor, Fornecedor.CompanyNumber as CNPJ, Fornecedor.ContactPerson AS Contato, Fornecedor.Email AS Email, Fornecedor.Fax AS Fax, Fornecedor.Free4 AS Telefone, Linha.LineItem AS Seq, Produto.ItemGroup as GrupoProduto, $$SQLGetDescGrupoItem^VARSQL(Produto.ItemGroup) AS GrupoProdDesc,
Linha.ItemNumber AS Codigo, Linha.ItemName AS DescProduto, Produto.CustomerTextorItemTextNo AS DescCompleta, $$SQLGetUnitSigla^VARSQL(Linha.ItemNumber) AS UnidadeMedida, Linha.Quantity AS Quantidade, $$SQLGetFormatDate^VARSQL(AFM.DateChanged) AS DataAlteracao, $$SQLGetFormatDate^VARSQL(AFM.DateCreated) AS DataCriacao, $$SQLGetFormatDate^VARSQL(AFM.RequiredDeliveryDate) AS DataDesejadaReceber, $$SQLGetUserName^VARSQL(AFM.CreatedBy) AS CriadoPor, decode(AFM.CreatedBy,"UNKNOWN","Carga de Dados-MEDTRAK",AFM.CreatedBy) AS CriadoPorCod, $$SQLGetUserName^VARSQL(AFM.ChangedBy) AS AlteradoPor, Produto.AverageCost as CustomMedio, Linha.Free5 as NotasLinha, Linha.Free12 as DescontoLinha, Linha.Free6 as FabricanteLinha, Linha.Free20 AS QuantArquiv,
Linha.Free7 as PrecoUnitario, (Linha.Free7 * Linha.Quantity) as ValorTotal,
-- Entregas: $$SQLgetDescEntrega^VARSQL(AFM.Free22,AFM.Free25,AFM.Free26) AS AFM_DescricaoDaEntrega, Entrega.NoEntrega1 AS Entrega_NumeroDaEntrega, Entrega.PrazodeEntrega AS Entrega_PrazoDeEntrega, $$SQLGetFormatDate^VARSQL(Entrega.DatadeEntrega) AS Entrega_DataDeEntrega, EntregaLinha.Linha As EntregaLinha_Seq, EntregaLinha.Quantidade AS EntregaLinha_Quantidade,
-- Historico de Alterações: $$SQLGetMotivoArquivamento^VARCompraHistorico(AFM.OrderNumber,AFM.Company) as MotivoArquivDoc, $$SQLGetMotivoArquivamento^VARCompraHistorico(AFM.OrderNumber,Linha.LineItem) as MotivoArquivLinha,
-- Somas - Andre, 28/04/2008: (SELECT SUM(Linha2.Free7 * Linha2.Quantity) FROM SQLUser.INAUFP AS Linha2 WHERE Linha2.OrderNo = AFM.OrderNumber AND Linha2.Company = AFM.Company) AS SomaAFM,
(SELECT SUM(Linha2.Free7 * Linha2.Quantity) FROM SQLUser.INAUFP AS Linha2 JOIN SQLUser.INART AS Produto2 ON Linha2.ItemNumber = Produto2.ItemNumber WHERE Linha2.OrderNo = AFM.OrderNumber AND Produto2.ItemGroup = Produto.ItemGroup AND Linha2.Company = AFM.Company) AS SomaGrupo
FROM SQLUser.INAUF AS AFM
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.INAUFP AS Linha ON AFM.Company = Linha.Company AND AFM.OrderNumber = Linha.OrderNo
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.INLIEF AS Fornecedor ON Fornecedor.SupplierNumber = AFM.SupplierNumber
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.WWW0121 AS Locais ON Locais.Location = AFM.Location
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.INART AS Produto ON Linha.ItemNumber = Produto.ItemNumber
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.VARCompraEntregaLinha As EntregaLinha ON Linha.Company = EntregaLinha.Company AND Linha.OrderNo = EntregaLinha.NoOrdemCompra AND Linha.LineItem = EntregaLinha.LinhadaOrdemdeCompra
LEFT JOIN SQLUser.VARCompraEntrega As Entrega ON AFM.Company = Entrega.Company AND Linha.OrderNo = Entrega.NoOrdemCompra AND Entrega.NoEntrega1 = EntregaLinha.NoEntrega
